page.title: 20LOCAL RESTAURANT
page.content:
Shrimptons restaurant was built of ships timbers and was made a restaurant in 1969. It was built in 1700 and received its name from the first people to own it. They have two full time workers and a few part- timers. It used to be a post-office and there once was a well that is cemented over now. The owners are specialists in a variety of carefully prepared French dishes. The restaurant has a widespread reputation but it is expensive by local standards. Dinner for two with wine can cost at least Â£25.
This information was compiled with much enjoyment and benefit by the pupils and staff of Camelsdale County First School.
